---
category: news
title: "Deep learning enhanced individual nuclear-spin detection"
excerpt: "The detection of nuclear spins using individual electron spins has enabled diverse opportunities in quantum sensing and quantum information processing. Proof-of-principle experiments have demonstrated atomic-scale imaging of nuclear-spin samples and controlled multi-qubit registers."
